tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: Taiwan has a rich cultural heritage, blending indigenous traditions with influences from China, Japan, and other cultures, seen in its arts, cuisine, and festivals.

tidbits.title: Technological Advancements
tidbits.description: The country is known for its technological innovation and manufacturing prowess, playing a significant role in global technology supply chains.

tidbits.title: Scenic Landscapes
tidbits.description: Taiwan offers diverse landscapes, from bustling cities to stunning natural beauty, including Taroko Gorge, Sun Moon Lake, and Alishan Mountain.
